entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 9:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -45.5°C
Wind: NNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
